g.text: FREE & OPEN SOURCE CLAUDE CODE PLUGIN
Agent Driven Development (ADD) is a SDLC methodology where orchestrated
agent swarms collaborate as a coordinated enterprise class development team.
You've done TDD and BDD. Now ADD something to your development.
Reads spec Â· Builds plan Â· Dispatches sub-agents Â· Independently verifies
Failing tests from spec. RED phase.
Minimal code to pass. GREEN phase.
Different agent Â· Fresh context Â· No shared state
PRD â†’ Spec â†’ Plan â†’ Tests â†’ Code. Every line traces to
an approved requirement. No more "not what I asked for."
Tests before every line of code
Strict TDD with independent verification. Sub-agents write
tests, implement, refactor. Orchestrators verify independently.
Agents that get smarter over time
Knowledge persists across projects. Patterns from Project A
inform Project B automatically. No repeated mistakes.
Maturity dial (POC â†’ Alpha â†’ Beta â†’ GA) governs all ADD
You set the boundaries. Agents work within them.
# RED â†’ GREEN â†’ REFACTOR â†’ VERIFY
ADD v0.1.0 â€” Agent Driven Development
MIT License â€” Free & Open Source
